item.title: Text Cleaning Assignment
item.description: To begin the assignment, first I must run my library to start using tidyverse. I then must open up my data and give it a name. library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.1 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.5 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.1.4 v dplyr 1.0.7 ## v tidyr 1.1.3 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 2.0.1 v forcats 0.5.1 ## -- Conflicts ------------------------------------------ tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() logs <- read_csv("badfootballlogs19.
